blocks.name: add12
blocks.content: Commutative/associative law that swaps the first two terms in a triple sum. (Contributed by NM, 11-May-2004.)

blocks.name: add32
blocks.content: Commutative/associative law that swaps the last two terms in a triple sum. (Contributed by NM, 13-Nov-1999.)

blocks.name: add32r
blocks.content: Commutative/associative law that swaps the last two terms in a triple sum, rearranging the parentheses. (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 18-May-2007.)

blocks.name: add4
blocks.content: Rearrangement of 4 terms in a sum. (Contributed by NM, 13-Nov-1999.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 22-Oct-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm add4(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc))), wceq(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), caddc, co(c2, caddc, c3)), co(co(c0, caddc, c2), caddc, co(c1, caddc, c3))))
} = {
  3eqtr4d(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), caddc, co(c2, caddc, c3)), co(co(c0, caddc, c2), caddc, co(c1, caddc, c3)), co(c0, caddc, co(c1, caddc, co(c2, caddc, c3))), co(c0, caddc, co(c2, caddc, co(c1, caddc, c3))), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc))))
  adantll(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc)), wceq(co(c0, caddc, co(c1, caddc, co(c2, caddc, c3))), co(c0, caddc, co(c2, caddc, co(c1, caddc, c3)))))
  oveq2d(c0, caddc, co(c1, caddc, co(c2, caddc, c3)), co(c2, caddc, co(c1, caddc, c3)), wa(wcel(c1, cc), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc))))
  3expb(wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc), wceq(co(c1, caddc, co(c2, caddc, c3)), co(c2, caddc, co(c1, caddc, c3))))
  add12(c1, c2, c3)
  sylan2(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc)), wceq(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), caddc, co(c2, caddc, c3)), co(c0, caddc, co(c1, caddc, co(c2, caddc, c3)))), wcel(co(c2, caddc, c3), cc))
  addcl(c2, c3)
  3expa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(co(c2, caddc, c3), cc), wceq(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), caddc, co(c2, caddc, c3)), co(c0, caddc, co(c1, caddc, co(c2, caddc, c3)))))
  addass(c0, c1, co(c2, caddc, c3))
  an4s(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc), wceq(co(co(c0, caddc, c2), caddc, co(c1, caddc, c3)), co(c0, caddc, co(c2, caddc, co(c1, caddc, c3)))))
  sylan2(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c2, cc)), wa(wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c3, cc)), wceq(co(co(c0, caddc, c2), caddc, co(c1, caddc, c3)), co(c0, caddc, co(c2, caddc, co(c1, caddc, c3)))), wcel(co(c1, caddc, c3), cc))
  addcl(c1, c3)
  3expa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c2, cc), wcel(co(c1, caddc, c3), cc), wceq(co(co(c0, caddc, c2), caddc, co(c1, caddc, c3)), co(c0, caddc, co(c2, caddc, co(c1, caddc, c3)))))
  addass(c0, c2, co(c1, caddc, c3))
}
